results.title: Diablo is done for (NP)
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Denise Patience, Calypso Films and Dept Health and Community Services
results.brief_description: This is a drama about child sexual abuse. All is not right at Ray’s home where he is no longer able to tolerate his father’s sexual abuse of his young brother Mikey. With the support of his friends and teacher, Ray finally takes a stand against his father. This is a non-explicit film about child sexual abuse suitable for secondary students.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Denise Patience, Calypso Films and Dept Health and Community Services

results.title: Diabetes : Restoring the Balance (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Aileen Llewellyn, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description: Structure and function of the pancreas. Differences in insulin and glucose levels over 24 hours in diabetics and non-diabetics. Differences between juvenile and maturity onset diabetes

results.title: Diabetes - Looking After Yourself
results.brief_description: Presented by Katrina Lee, this video is designed to help people with mature onset diabetes to look after themselves. It answers the question - What is Diabetes? - and describes preventative measures such as improved diet and food care.
results.description: Presented by Katrina Lee, this video is designed to help people with mature onset diabetes to look after themselves. It answers the question - What is Diabetes? - and describes preventative measures such as improved diet and food care.

results.title: Devon dairy farming
results.brief_description: After an analysis of the geographical conditions of South Devon, England, this film shows the daily work on a typical dairy farm, and the distribution of mill to Plymouth and local cheese factories.

results.title: Development of the big man: Lucias Mitchell
results.brief_description: Basketball coach Lucia Mitchell believes that in order to bring ou the best in the big man he must be pushed harder than other players. Mitchell stress ability and reaction drills as well as ball handling skills.

results.title: Development of movement themes in the gymnasium (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Margaret Rosewarne and Swift Film Productions
results.brief_description: Students demonstrate the basic movements used in comparatively advanced educational gymnastics. In four parts - balance, elevation, use of apparatus, and advanced examples. Aims to encourage inventiveness and resourcefulness, and illustrates body tension, transition, and group rhythms.
results.title_for_label: Development of movement themes in the gymnasium (TEFC)

results.title: Development (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Bruce Hart, CRM Productions and McGraw-Hill Films
results.brief_description: This film examines the stages of growth from birth to adolescence, introducing the concept of human psychological development. Accompanied by a song written and performed by Donovan and another written by Graham Nash and performed by Crosby, stills, Nash and Young.
